org.ensembl.driver
Class LoggingManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.driver.LoggingManager
public class LoggingManager
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to simplify logging system configuration.

Setting the environment variable verbose (e.g. java -Dverbose ... ) causes the logging file loaded to be shown.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

configure

public static void configure()
Initialise logging system with file DEFAULT_LOGGING_CONF_FILE.

configure

public static void configure(java.lang.String filepath)
Configures logging system with contents of the file filepath. It tries to load the file as a 'normal' file first relative to the current working directory. A 'slash' at the beginning of the filepath makes it absolute. If that fails it attempts to load the file relative to the classpath. This means the config file can be in a jar.

Parameters:
filepath - path relative to current working directory OR the classpath.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if filpath not found.

configure

public static void configure(java.net.URL file)
Configures logging system with contents of URL. Note that the call is ignored if the logging system has already been configured via the system property java.util.logging.config.file.

isConfigured

public static boolean isConfigured()
